name: Frustration
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Frustration except Unown, Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Burmy, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Deals damage. Power is based off of Friendship with the formula: (255-Frienship)/2.5. The lower the Friendship is, the higher the base power. It has a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 102 base power.
viability: In game, Frustration is useful when you first catch a Pokemon because they'll be at their base friendship. In competitive, unless you consciously make sure the Pokemon's happiness is low this move will be awful.
